item.title: Lista de comandos úteis do Vim
item.description: O arquivo em PDF pode ser baixado AQUI. <div id="block_1068_3250" class="cheat_sheet_output_block"> <table id="cheat_sheet_output_table" class="cheat_sheet_output_onecol" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> o: open in prev window </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> go: preview </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> t: open in new tab </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> T: open in new tab silently </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> i: open split </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> gi: preview split </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> s: open vsplit </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> gs: preview vsplit </div> </td> </tr> </table> </div> </div> <div id="block_3251" class="cheat_sheet_output_wrapper cheat_sheet_output_column_onecol"> <h3 id="title_1068_3251" class="cheat_sheet_output_title"> Direct­ories </h3> <div id="block_1068_3251" class="cheat_sheet_output_block"> <table id="cheat_sheet_output_table" class="cheat_sheet_output_onecol" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> o: open & close </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> O: recurs­ively open </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> x: close parent </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> X: close all children recurs­ively </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> e: explore selected dir </div> </td> </tr> </table> </div> </div> </td> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_column_spacer" width="2%"> </td> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_sortable cheat_sheet_output_column_2" valign="top" width="32%"> <div id="block_3253" class="cheat_sheet_output_wrapper cheat_sheet_output_column_onecol"> <h3 id="title_1068_3253" class="cheat_sheet_output_title"> Bookmarks </h3> <div id="block_1068_3253" class="cheat_sheet_output_block"> <table id="cheat_sheet_output_table" class="cheat_sheet_output_onecol" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> o: open bookmark </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> t: open in new tab </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> T: open in new tab silently </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> D: delete bookmark </div> </td> </tr> </table> </div> </div> <div class="hideprint"> </div> <div id="block_3254" class="cheat_sheet_output_wrapper cheat_sheet_output_column_onecol"> <h3 id="title_1068_3254" class="cheat_sheet_output_title"> Filesystem </h3> <div id="block_1068_3254" class="cheat_sheet_output_block"> <table id="cheat_sheet_output_table" class="cheat_sheet_output_onecol" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> C: change tree root to selected dir </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> u: move tree root up a dir </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> U: move tree root up a dir but leave old root open </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> r: refresh cursor dir </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> R: refresh current root </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> m: Show menu </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> cd: change the CWD to the selected dir </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> CD: change tree root to CWD </div> </td> </tr> </table> </div> </div> </td> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_column_spacer" width="2%"> </td> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_sortable cheat_sheet_output_column_3" valign="top" width="32%"> <div id="block_3252" class="cheat_sheet_output_wrapper cheat_sheet_output_column_onecol"> <h3 id="title_1068_3252" class="cheat_sheet_output_title"> Tree navigation </h3> <div id="block_1068_3252" class="cheat_sheet_output_block"> <table id="cheat_sheet_output_table" class="cheat_sheet_output_onecol" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0"> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> p: go to parent </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> P: go to root </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> K: go to first child </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> J: go to last child </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> <C-­k>: go to prev sibling </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> <C-­j>: go to next sibling </div> </td> </tr> </table> </div> </div> <div id="block_3255" class="cheat_sheet_output_wrapper cheat_sheet_output_column_onecol"> <h3 id="title_1068_3255" class="cheat_sheet_output_title"> Tree filtering </h3> <div <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> I: hidden files (off) </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> f: file filters (on) </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="altrow countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> F: files (on) </div> </td> </tr> <tr class="countrow"> <td class="cheat_sheet_output_cell_1" colspan="1" valign="top"> <div> B: bookmarks (off) </div> </td> </tr> </table> </div> </div> <div id="block_3256" class="cheat_sheet_output_wrapper cheat_sheet_output_column_onecol"> <h3 id="title_1068_3256" class="cheat_sheet_output_title"> Other commands </h3> <div id="block_1068_3256" class="cheat_sheet_output_block"> <table
